items.sentence: Tom as well as everybody else in the room knew what the problem was.
I'm not so sure I could cope with that, at least not as well as you.
I want to ask Tom what he's been doing, but I know that I shouldn't.
Tom was holding a suitcase in one hand and an umbrella in the other.
I know that it's highly unlikely anyone would be willing to help me.
I just want you to know that I won't be able to attend your wedding.
If you didn't want me to hold your hand, then why did you ask me to?
Tomorrow we go to school to sign up for the classes we want to take.
I don't think Tom should be held responsible for something Mary did.
Tom's house got broken into last night and his dog didn't even bark.
